control_attributes.Control: SC-40 (3) IMITATIVE OR MANIPULATIVE COMMUNICATIONS DECEPTION
control_attributes.control_description: The information system implements cryptographic mechanisms to identify and reject wireless transmissions that are deliberate attempts to achieve imitative or manipulative communications deception based on signal parameters.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization ensures that the information system is configured so that data or information collected by the [Assignment: organization-defined sensors] is only reported to authorized individuals or roles.

Control Statement: The information system implements cryptographic mechanisms to identify and reject wireless transmissions that are deliberate attempts to achieve imitative or manipulative communications deception based on signal parameters.
Control Name: SC-40 (3) IMITATIVE OR MANIPULATIVE COMMUNICATIONS DECEPTION
